name: Image Generator Agent
description: Generate stunning, high-quality images on demand and leverage powerful editing capabilities to modify, enhance, or completely transform visuals.

skills.name: Generate Image Tool
skills.description: Image generation tool that generates images or modifies a given image based on a prompt.
examples: Generate a photorealistic image of raspberry lemonade

skills.name: Invoke CrewAI
skills.description: Kickoff CrewAI and return the response.
examples: Invoke CrewAI with a specific query

skills.name: Get Image Data
skills.description: Return Imagedata given a key. This is a helper method from the agent.
examples: Retrieve image data using a session ID and image key
